pullrequest.title: Process insertions and deletions on gz log echo - fix issue #2136

content.raw:
In the [most recent jenkins build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1030/), the [INTEGRATION_world_playback test is failing via timeout](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1030/testReport/junit/(root)/INTEGRATION_world_playback/test_ran/) during the `Pause/2` test (using state3.log):

~~~
421: [ RUN      ] LogFiles/WorldPlaybackTest.Pause/2
421: [Msg] Waiting for master.
421: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
421: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.252
421: [Msg] 
421: Log playback:
421:   Log Version: 1.0
421:   Gazebo Version: 7.0.0
421:   Random Seed: 230988675
421:   Log Start Time: 13 130000000
421:   Log End Time: 22 773000000
421: [Wrn] [Publisher.cc:141] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/pose/local/info, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
421: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:207] ServerFixture load in 1.2 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
421: Warning [parser.cc:438] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
421: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo7/test/integration/world_playback.cc:112: Failure
421: Value of: this->world->IsPaused()
421:   Actual: false
421: Expected: true
421/526 Test #421: INTEGRATION_world_playback ............................***Timeout 240.03 sec
~~~
content.html:
In the most recent jenkins build, the INTEGRATION_world_playback test is failing via timeout during the Pause/2 test (using state3.log):

421: [ RUN      ] LogFiles/WorldPlaybackTest.Pause/2
421: [Msg] Waiting for master.
421: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
421: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.252
421: [Msg] 
421: Log playback:
421:   Log Version: 1.0
421:   Gazebo Version: 7.0.0
421:   Random Seed: 230988675
421:   Log Start Time: 13 130000000
421:   Log End Time: 22 773000000
421: [Wrn] [Publisher.cc:141] Queue limit reached for topic /gazebo/default/pose/local/info, deleting message. This warning is printed only once.
421: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:207] ServerFixture load in 1.2 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
421: Warning [parser.cc:438] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
421: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo7/test/integration/world_playback.cc:112: Failure
421: Value of: this->world->IsPaused()
421:   Actual: false
421: Expected: true
421/526 Test #421: INTEGRATION_world_playback ............................***Timeout 240.03 sec
